sys_template.name: RPN-SD- Application Fault - Degraded Performance
sys_template.template:
short_description=Application Fault - Degraded Performance^instructions=Application affected: Description of Issue: Multiple sites affected?
Recent performance issues reported by the branch? (Check for interactions raised in the last 2 weeks) Have there been any recent changes at branch e.g. additional PCs/iGels/Phones, software installs/upgrades?
If web based, what is the refresh time/response time from that application (in seconds)? Where does the performance degrade within the application/website (Remove all that arenâ€™t applicable) - Initial loading of the application/website - Logging on to the application/website - Navigating through fields - Searching or browsing for items - Submitting/sending data - Receiving confirmation/downloading documents/images - Is the issue constant or intermittent?^affected_system=Generic Desktop Applications (RPN)^cmdb_ci=^close_notes=^contact_type=phone^impact=3^category=Software^subcategory=Performance degradation^close_code=Solved (Permanently)
